segments.text: The kitchen layout is straightforward, with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters through the divided window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path winds neatly between plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman dries her plate with gentle care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water from the faucet is creating an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the floor, a slippery hazard waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool with innocent curiosity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the cookie jar is bold and fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, her hand outstretched eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sneaky cookie mission brings a smile to my face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even with the risks, it's a charming family vignette.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame their little adventure perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will laugh when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a delightful, lively moment in this home.
segments.speaker: PAR
